description: [``botocore``] We added 5 new stack refactoring APIs: CreateStackRefactor, ExecuteStackRefactor, ListStackRefactors, DescribeStackRefactor, ListStackRefactorActions.
[``botocore``] This release adds the ability to conditionally require fields on a template. Check public documentation for more information.
[``botocore``] This release enables AWS Cost Optimization Hub to show cost optimization recommendations for Amazon Auto Scaling Groups, including those with single and mixed instance types.
[``botocore``] Updated list of the valid AWS Region values for the LocationConstraint parameter for general purpose buckets.
[``botocore``] The SDK no longer validates payload size for eventstreams. This is to facilitate varying payload requirements across AWS services.
